Title: Relating to protecting indigent women in the United States in the exercise of their personal control over their bodies and health care decisions and to promote commerce between the states
Summary: Enacts provisions to protect indigent women in the United States in the exercise of their personal control over their bodies and health care decisions and to promote commerce between the states; provides financial assistance to women from outside New York seeking abortions in this state.
ActClause: AN ACT relating to protecting indigent women in the United States in the exercise of their personal control over their bodies and health care decisions and to promote commerce between the states
